name: Ela Pichan
text: Ordered a large pizza -8 wings and (2) 2 liters. With tip 40.00  Confirmation said 35 minutes. It was almost an hour. Finally get our delivery and the wings were by far, the tiniest I have ever seen. The large pizza had the items only the ‚Ä¶More

name: Chelsea Shaw
text: This was my first time ordering from this Hungry Howies and there was a miscommunication in my order. When I called back and explained the problem they sent a new pizza. The staff was great, service was great, food was great. Will be a patron of here again.

name: Dennis R Swindle, Sr
text: The employees of this restaurant work hard to deliver a quality pizza or other product. We have never been disappointed in the service and the quality of the pizza.

name: Katie Short
text: My family orders from her almost weekly and tonight I called and they said they were no longer delivering to our area. Very unprofessional!

name: Cayla B
text:
This place has always been great. A must have when we visit Michigan!
Edit to 6-17-2020 still amazing. Thanks boss man and boss lady

name: Leslie White
text: My order has always been correct and is ready on time. 5/5 stars.

name: Marty Betts
text: Just not great this time but have had really good pizza in the past.  Calzones are yummy.

name: Ryan Quayle
text: Consistently good service and quality. Our orders are nearly always ready faster than the stated wait. Don't forget their salads.

name: Malachi Daws
text: Loved y'all's pizza.  Still remember it from 2004.  Telling my kids about it now.

name: J Strickland
text: I really enjoyed their dishes. I always get good service there. The place is neat and the cashiers are always very kind. Will come back again.

name: Robbie Ramos
text:
Would be nice for once if my order was ready when I told it was. I always end up waiting another 10 to 15 minutes
6 months later same bs when I order. Oh for some reason your order isn't ready yet sorry our site said it was please wait

name: Crista Turner
text: Always a standby when we don't want to cook and need an easy dinner. Pizza is always fresh and on time.

name: Rick Ott
text: Can't go 4 stars, why, let me tell you. I order my pizza from here well done light sauce. Not because I like my pizza this way, but because how I receive it. I order it this way because I am most likely to receive a cooked pizza this way. ‚Ä¶More

name: Tricia Lynn
text: Quick service, pizza pretty good, reasonable price, but service was great.

name: Bob Pegler
text: Like the flavored crust and the boneless wings the best.

name: Jeremy Napier
text: I always order from here when I stop in town to visit my parents because of the pizza/crust/subs are incredible.  We must have ordered from here 100+ times since the business has been open, and today was no different.

name: Quinten Branham
text: Way overpriced and overrated had a coupon for40 percent off and bill was still 70:00 not impressed at all

name: Jeanne Luddeni
text: All I can say is yummy. Great place great service and great delivery drivers.

name: Dani Hoover
text: This is an excellent location to order from!  Timely service, excellent products, good prices.  Thank you, Hungry Howie's!!

name: jeffery tooley
text: Love the pizza with Cajun crust. Jeff Tooley- Howard Hanna Realtor

name: Stephanie Spaulding
text: Love this place I only order pizza from you I just have to say kudos to your staff for the best of the best with my pizza Awesome delivery staff I had today

text: Fabulous, great customer service and the food Chow Belle ! Can't wait to go back  !

name: Moby
text: Pretty good food, pretty good people

name: Jennifer Dunn
text: Great pizza delivered hot and fast. Why would you want sub par pizza hot and ready when you can get delicious pizza fresh, hot, and delivered to your house....

name: Jordan Scott
text: Pretty good spot if you're looking for chain pizza. Great lunch deals daily.

name: Baking basic's
text: Really good pizza, always cooked right and fast, I just wish the still served the Philly Cheese Steak pizza, that was our favorite, for me its what set them apart from other pizza places.... oh well, nothing lasts forever, other than that great people and food!!!

name: bm40
text: Always good pizza and sandwiches

name: Elizabeth Wilhelm
text: Love their calzones!! Cashier was great too! Overall wonderful experience.

name: Katie Westfall
text: So I messed up. I didn't know they ordered an extra Howie bread and didn't pay for it. I feel so guilty. I will be stopping by to pay for it. And I am sorry to the driver

name: Christopher Lewandowski
text: Family loves the flavored crust option

name: Andrew Sanderson
text: Never had a problem.  Food is great. Delivery drivers are always friendly.

name: mike polzin
text: Hungry Howie's Pizza in Milan is doing an great job!  Ordering a Pizza in this town Hungry Howie's is the way to go. I have been ordering from this location for 5 years and not have had a bad experience. Thank you for your ease of ordering ‚Ä¶More

text: Pizza prepared as ordered, yummy as usual. Staff friendly.

name: John Fraley
text: I always ordered the calzone pizza sub and it always came with pepperoni on it just ordered one got it homr there was nothing but cheese on it so i called to find out a sub now comes wih nothing on it for the same price it's very disappointing

text: Botched app order with no compensation - We tend to love Hungry Howies at my house, but this past Friday I ordered two pizzas in the afternoon to be picked up at a specific time in the evening.  When we got there, they only had one pizza ‚Ä¶More

text: I don't want to hurt local business, but I hope you will start doing a little better quality control, food today was not what is used to be.
